mapper.select: SELECT U.UPLOAD_NO , U.UPLOAD_TITLE , U.UPLOAD_CONTENT , U.CREATED_AT , U.MODIFIED_AT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACH A WHERE U.UPLOAD_NO = A.UPLOAD_NO) AS ATTACH_COUNT FROM UPLOAD U
SELECT ATTACH_NO, PATH, ORIGIN_NAME, FILESYSTEM_NAME, DOWNLOAD_COUNT, HAS_THUMBNAIL, UPLOAD_NO FROM ATTACH WHERE PATH LIKE CONCAT('%', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1,'YYYY/MM/DD'))
